sources.title: THE INVADERS (1912) -- dir. by Thomas Ince
sources.description: THE INVADERS (1912) Starring: Francis Ford, Ethel Grandin, Ann Little, William Eagle Shirt, Art Accord Directed by Francis Ford and Thomas Ince Produced by Thomas Ince Kay Bee-Union Film Company William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

sources.title: The Invaders (1912)
sources.description: The U.S. Army and the Indians sign a peace treaty. However, a group of surveyors trespass on the Indians' land and violate the treaty. The army refuses to listen to the Indians' complaints, and the surveyors are killed by the Indians. A vicious Indian war ensues, culminating in an Indian attack on an army fort. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-invaders-1912/

metadata.Plot: The U.S. Army and the Indians sign a peace treaty. However, a group of surveyors trespass on the Indians' land and violate the treaty. The army refuses to listen to the Indians' complaints, and the surveyors are killed by the Indians. A vicious Indian war ensues, culminating in an Indian attack on an army fort.
metadata.Actors: Francis Ford, Ethel Grandin, Ann Little
